attributes.action: Stop The Rot Of Social Housing Property Owners
attributes.additional_details:
Do you work hard, pay taxes and have a mortgage or pay rent in order to keep a roof over your head?

Then sign this petition if you think property speculators in the social housing sector should be prevented from buying up property in your street with the intention of taking on people on benefits and collecting the rent from the welfare state without informing the other residents.

Sign this petition if you think you have right to know and a right to say NO to "Problem Families" being placed in these homes in your street.
